headline: Ask HN: How to learn Computer networks from 0 to hero
description: Hi there. I am a young Software engineer who is doing fullstack development and interested in DevOps and Cloud Stuff. I am planning to start my journey in Cloud but before that want to dive into Computer networking topics. Only course I know is Bits and Bytes of Computer Networking in Coursera. Feel free to suggest me any other useful sources/links/websites/courses etc.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何从0到英雄学习计算机网络
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何從0到英雄學習計算機網絡
description_zh-Hans: 你们好。我是一名年轻的软件工程师，正在做全栈开发，对DevOps和云计算感兴趣。我打算开始我的云计算之旅，但在这之前，我想深入了解计算机网络主题。我唯一知道的课程是Coursera中的Bits and Bytes of Computer Networking。欢迎向我推荐任何其他有用的资源/链接/网站/课程等。
description_zh-Hant: 你們好。我是一名年輕的軟件工程師，正在做全棧開發，對DevOps和雲計算感興趣。我打算開始我的雲計算之旅，但在這之前，我想深入瞭解計算機網絡主題。我唯一知道的課程是Coursera中的Bits and Bytes of Computer Networking。歡迎向我推薦任何其他有用的資源/鏈接/網站/課程等。
